Package mmj.transforms

Class AssociativeInfo

java.lang.Object
mmj.transforms.DBInfo
mmj.transforms.AssociativeInfo
public class AssociativeInfo extends DBInfo
The information about associative operations.

Note: the current implementation contains some stub implementations!

      public mmj.transforms.GeneralizedStmt getGenStmtForAssocNode(ParseNode node, mmj.transforms.WorksheetInfo info)
      This function searches generalized statement for node which is considered to be the root of some associative actions
      Parameters:
      node - the input node
      info - the work sheet info
      Returns:
      the found generalized statement or null

    • createAssociativeStep

      public GenProofStepStmt createAssociativeStep(mmj.transforms.WorksheetInfo info, mmj.transforms.GeneralizedStmt assocProp, int from, ParseNode firstNode, ParseNode secondNode)
      Creates f(f(a, b), c) = f(a, f(b, c)) or f(a, f(b, c)) = f(f(a, b), c) statement.
      Parameters:
      info - the work sheet info
      assocProp - the generalized associative statement
      from - 0 if we should use f(f(a, b), c) = f(a, f(b, c)) form and 1 if we should use f(a, f(b, c)) = f(f(a, b), c)
      firstNode - the first node (f(f(a, b), c) or f(a, f(b, c)))
      secondNode - the second node (f(a, f(b, c)) or f(f(a, b), c))
      Returns:
      the created step
